title: thiago007
author: thiago007
content: Today I was looking at this post on twitter, and I wonder if someone goes to Las Vegas that can buy me a few.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: I would be interested as well maybe Mopar could get us some?

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: they posted on telegram that these are being handed out to people who bought tickets/attend the litecoin summit - I did ask if it would be possible to do a group buy - still awaiting a response.
